Product id: sdb-rbx2244 fabric colour: sandstone material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes devon sand roller blind in brown.
